ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Dumb questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: That s a stat that started with the new expansion. I ve yet to see a way to bring this number up or down. Mine has been at 15 ever since the expansion came
ygData.messageBody:
That's a stat that started with the new expansion. I've yet to see a way to
bring this number up or down. Mine has been at 15 ever since the expansion
came out.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

There is a stat at the bottom of my player stat window that says
Corruption.

I assume that is updated when a character commits an offense against
his home town like attacking a member of one of their allies or, worse
still, attacking someone in his own city. Please correct me if I'm
wrong about that.

My corruption stat is 15. Is there a way to remove corruption?
